SELECT vps.id AS id, vps.id_stat_statement AS id_stat_statement, CAST(vps.value_ AS VARCHAR(127)) AS value, vps.id_match AS id_match, vps.id_season AS id_season, vps.id_player AS id_player, vps.id_league AS id_league, vps.id_team AS id_team, vps.id_league_player AS id_league_player, vps.id_sport AS id_sport FROM intramurudes.v_player_stat vps WHERE vps.id = #{id};
